mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_user ( username, password, real_name, phone, email, gender, avatar, status, user_type, student_number, department, major, class_name, create_time, update_time ) VALUES ( #{username}, #{password}, #{realName}, #{phone}, #{email}, #{gender}, #{avatar}, #{status}, #{userType}, #{studentNumber}, #{department}, #{major}, #{className}, NOW(), NOW() )
mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM sys_user WHERE deleted = 0
AND username LIKE CONCAT('%', #{username}, '%')
AND real_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{realName}, '%')
AND user_type = #{userType}
ORDER BY create_time DESC
